Text: Great. Ma'am, can you please describe the perp to sergeant Jeffords?

Name: LADY
Text: Yeah, he had, um, dark, curly hair, and a neck tattoo...

Name: TERRY
Text: Wait, wait, wait. Slow down. Let's start with the eyes. Were they desperate? Lonely? Did they betray heartache?

Name: LADY
Text: They were brown.

Name: TERRY
Text: Do you even want your purse back?

Name: ROSA
Text: So far you've managed to tell three fat jokes and completely bulldoze Charles. Is that your idea of being a good secondary?

Name: JAKE
Text: First off, I've told four. And second, I'm helping. I mean, I started cataloguing the contents of the fridge, but it turns out there's not enough paper on earth. Five fat jokes. Thanks, Arnie. [Laughs] See, Arnie thinks I'm doing great.

Text: You look like an idiot.

Text: I took the dog for a walk. When I came back, he was dead. I'm just in shock. We were going on a cruise together next week. He had pre-purchased the unlimited soda package.

Name: JAKE

Name: JAKE

Text: Oh.

Text: Hey, can I ask you guys something? Can you keep a secret?

Text: The guy died of natural causes. What's the big deal? Anyways, back to last night. As you would imagine, I'm normally up for pretty much anything in the bedroom, but I can't tell if what happened was weird or sexy.

Name: ROSSI
Text: Wait. Close your eyes.

Name: JAKE
Text: Oh, okay.

Name: ROSSI
Text: Shh. Shh, shh, shh, shh, shh, shh.

Name: ROSSI
Text: rI like 'em cold.

Name: JAKE
Text: Okay...

Name: ROSA

Name: JAKE

Name: AMY
Text: You're reading into that.

Name: JAKE

Name: ROSSI
Text: You have a really nice chest.

Name: JAKE
Text: Thank you.

Name: ROSSI
Text: I'd love to crack it open and get my hands all over your organs.

Name: JAKE
Text: Okay...

Name: ROSSI
Text: I wonder how much your appendix weighs. [Gasps] Oh. It's inflamed.

Name: JAKE
Text: All right. Wait, that's bad, right?

Name: ROSSI
Text: Yeah, it is. Oh, no.

Name: AMY

Name: ROSSI

Name: JAKE

Name: ROSSI

Name: JAKE

Name: JAKE
Text: Bruising around the neck. And ocean water in the lungs.

Name: ROSSI

Name: ROSSI

Name: JAKE

Name: ROSSI
Text: Perfect.

Name: JAKE
Text: Here we go.

Name: AMY
Text: Stop, stop, stop! Weird, weird, weird!

Name: JAKE
Text: Rosa, what's your call? Weird or sexy?

Name: ROSA
Text: Weird.

Name: JAKE
Text: I knew it. But also kinda sexy?

Name: ROSA
Text: No. Weird. But more importantly, that's what you were doing while Charles was grinding through paperwork?

Name: AMY
Text: Told ya. Worst secondary in the unit. What do you guys want from me? You know, I take over a crime scene, I'm a bad secondary. I blow off work to have s*x with a hot coroner, I'm a bad secondary. I can't win.

Name: CHARLES
Text: What are you guys talking about?

Name: JAKE
Text: Um, just weird s*x stuff that has nothing to do with work.

Name: CHARLES
Text: I once had s*x on a futon. And it was in couch mode.

Name: JAKE
Text: Hmm.

Name: AMY
Text: Sarge, all of these are fine. How much longer are you gonna work on this?

Name: TERRY
Text: It's questions like that that made Van Gogh cut off his ear. You can't put a clock on art. Ten minutes.

Name: AMY
Text: Great. Let's catch this guy so we can give Holt some good news. I wanna cheer him up.

Name: SCULLY
Text: Well, how do you even know he's in a bad mood? I mean, it's impossible to read that guy.

Name: HOLT
Text: This is the most incompetent, worthless report I have ever read in my life! Get your act together or, so help me God, you won't live to see retirement!

Name: SCULLY
Text: It's like, "what's that guy thinking?" You know?

Name: AMY
Text: I can read him. And if anyone can figure out what's bothering him, it's me. He and I are exactly the same. Except that I'm younger, Cuban, female, single, and straight.

Name: TERRY
Text: Captain Holt's not gay. Captain Holt's gay?

Name: AMY
Text: Seriously, man, just retire.

Name: HOLT
Text: Boyle, where's my paperwork on that DOA? Still waiting on the autopsy report. Supposed to come in first thing this morning, but so far, nothing.

Name: HOLT
Text: This is unacceptable. I'll call the M.E. and find out what happened.

Name: JAKE
Text: Eh, bup-bup-bup-bup-bah. That's not necessary, sir. For the record, I think it's natural causes anyway, but I'm also the secondary in this case. It's my responsibility, so I will head on down there and pick up the report.

Name: HOLT
Text: Good. But don't ever bup-bup-bup-bup me again.

Name: JAKE
Text: Right, I don't know...

Name: HOLT
Text: Bup-bup-bup-bup... Bup-bup-bup. Just go.

Name: JAKE
Text: Yep, I am going to regret teaching him that one.

Name: BOYLE
Text: Rosa, can I show you something? What's up? Patterson's wife told me that they were going on a cruise together next month, but her credit card bill shows only one ticket booked. Either she's lying or she knew he was gonna die.

Name: ROSA
Text: Huh, nice find, Boyle.

Name: BOYLE
Text: This could be a murder. Where's that autopsy? Jake went down to the M.E. an hour and a half ago. He still hasn't got back to me.

Name: ROSA
Text: Jake went to get the autopsy report?

Name: BOYLE
Text: I know. Isn't he the best? I mean, he's really coming into his own as a secondary. I wanna get him something nice. Does he come across more as a Pinot guy or more of a Shiraz?

Name: ROSA
Text: You know what? We better go down there. See what's holding him up.

Name: CHARLES
Text: Good call.

Name: ROSSI
Text: Detectives. [Clears throat] Hello.

Name: ROSA
Text: Shirt's buttoned wrong.

Name: DR. ROSSI
Text: Huh. So it is. Well, how can I help you?

Name: BOYLE
Text: Uh, we came by to get that autopsy report. Hmm. Is Detective Peralta here? I haven't seen him. Thanks for coming by.

Name: ROSA
Text: Hold on. Found him.

Name: JAKE
Text: Ah, thank goodness you're here. I am so lost. Do you know where the vending machines are?

Name: JAKE
Text: Look, it's not what it seems like. Yes, it is. Yes, it is. Here's what happened. I came down here to get the autopsy report and in conclusion, here we are. Now if you'll excuse me...

Name: ROSA
Text: Cut the crap, Peralta. Look, I'm sorry I slowed down the autopsy results, but everyone knows it's natural causes.

Name: BOYLE
Text: Not anymore. We think it could be a murder.

Name: JAKE
Text: Wait, like a murder murder, or, like, his mouth murdered him by making him eat so much food that his heart exploded?

Name: ROSA
Text: Murder murder.

Name: ROSSI
Text: We need the autopsy to be sure.

Name: ROSSI
Text: I have not gotten to that yet.

Name: CHARLES
Text: You guys have been down here for two hours. What, did you have s*x 40 times?

Name: JAKE
Text: 40 times? No, Charles, like... Look, I'm sorry. We didn't know it was a homicide.

Name: CHARLES
Text: Well, it shouldn't matter. I'm your primary and I asked you to do something. So if it's okay, I'd like to be upset with you.

Name: JAKE
Text: It's more than okay. It's okay times two. Now, Dr. Rossi, will you please perform the autopsy for us right now?

Name: ROSSI
Text: Actually, with a body this size, I'd need my assistant, and I gave him the rest of the afternoon off when Jake showed up.

Name: JAKE
Text: Guilty. Okay, fine. I will act as your assistant because I am a wonderful secondary. How gross could it be?

Name: ROSSI
Text: Just gonna need you to hold open this chest cavity for me.

Name: JAKE
Text: Oh. Wow. Okay, I can do that. It's no big deal. Just like holding open some slimy elevator doors. For a family of aliens... Oh, my God.

Name: ROSSI
Text: Yep, there are some signs of stress on the heart, but that's not surprising. Oh, will you look at that stomach lining? God, that is just a beaut.

Name: JAKE
Text: Ugh.

Name: ROSSI
Text: All right. I'm gonna need you to go ahead and take your hand...

Name: ROSSI
Text: Yep, get it down there.

Name: ROSSI
Text: Get it down there. Get it on in

Name: ROSSI
Text: There you go. Oh, that is so big.

Name: HOLT
Text: Caught him?

Name: AMY
Text: Yes, sir. He was easy to pick up. He looked just like the sergeant's sketch.

Name: SCULLY
Text: You could be a professional artist, boss. Like on the boardwalk.

Name: TERRY
Text: You think I should draw caricatures? That's garbage art! I don't draw giant-head people on surfboards!

Name: SCULLY
Text: I'm saying you could. You're that good.

Name: AMY
Text: Captain, the credit really goes to sergeant Jeffords. Without his refined artistic skills...

Name: HOLT
Text: Finish the paperwork by noon. I want it included in the crime stats.

Name: PERP
Text: I gotta say, I always hate how I look in pictures, but that is so flattering. Also, I'm innocent.

Name: TERRY
Text: Shut up.

Name: AMY
Text: Sarge, I need you to do one more drawing for me. What? It'll cheer the Captain up. He'll be over the moon. He may even lean back in his chair a little and nod slightly.

Name: TERRY
Text: This is a lot of pressure. If I'm gonna do this, it has to be done right. Scully, get me my oils.

Name: SCULLY
Text: Paint or massage? I'll get both.

Name: ROSSI
Text: You know, this is one of the most unhealthy people I've ever seen. It's like cutting into a big, overstuffed ravioli. Sure you want me to keep digging?

Name: JAKE
Text: Unfortunately, yes. If the primary on this case says it's a murder, we have to treat it like a murder.

Name: ROSSI
Text: Okay. Here we go. Oh. Wanna see something cool?

Name: JAKE
Text: No.

Name: ROSSI
Text: Here it is. That's what I'm talking about. [Gasps] Listen. Goosh.

Name: JAKE
Text: Mm-hmm.

Name: ROSSI
Text: You know what that was? That was the air releasing from the large intestine. [Sighs] In the biz, we call that "the death bubble." It's pretty cool. Here, you wanna hold it?

Name: JAKE
Text: No!

Name: AMY
Text: Knock knock.

Name: HOLT
Text: You can knock with your hands. Saying it is ridiculous.

Name: AMY
Text: Okay. Well, I know you're having a bad day... I think you're having a bad day. So, to cheer you up I had Terry do this painting to replace the photo you hated.

Name: HOLT
Text: I threw away the photo because I think it's ostentatious to hang pictures of yourself. Especially when you haven't earned a place on the wall.

Name: AMY
Text: Oh.

Name: HOLT
Text: But you would have me hang a baroque oil painting of myself like I'm a north Korean dictator. What? No ornate gold frame? Why am I not astride my noble steed, clad in armor? We could add a horse. You just wasted your time, Terry's time, and now my time on this when you should have been filing a report on the purse-snatcher.

Name: AMY
Text: Oh, I did. It's already in the system.

Name: CAPTAIN
Text: Oh. Mm-hmm. Good. Thank you. Dismissed.

Name: ROSSI
Text: Here are the contents of his stomach. Oh, that's where they went. And here's the really cool part. Get in here, look at the scarring on this liver. Cause of death

Name: JAKE
Text: Boyle was right. All right, I'm gonna go tell him.

Name: ROSSI
Text: Yeah, you could. Or you could stay for a post-mortem.

Name: JAKE
Text: Nope. Sorry. The spell has worn off. No more weird dead guy s*x for me ever again. It's nothing personal, I just think s*x is for the living. Isn't that right, buddy? Oh, my God, he has no eyes! Oh, that is terrifying.

Name: AMY
Text: What now, Santiago?

Name: AMY
Text: I figured out why you've been so tense. You're worried about the monthly crime statistics.

Name: HOLT
Text: That's not your concern.

Name: AMY
Text: I just checked the stats myself. Our arrest numbers haven't improved since you got here. They're exactly the same as last month.

Name: HOLT
Text: If this is your strategy to cheer me up, it's backfiring.

Name: AMY
Text: Sir, I don't think you realize how good flat numbers are. I went back 12 years. A precinct's numbers almost always get worse under new leadership, but ours didn't. That's a win. It's just your first month. Morale is much higher, people are working harder, you're well on your way to earning a place on that wall.

Name: HOLT
Text: Thank you, Santiago.

Name: AMY
Text: You know, we're birds of a feather, you and I.

Name: HOLT
Text: I hate cliches.

Name: AMY
Text: Cliches are the worst. Okay.

Name: CHARLES
Text: We know you killed your husband. That cruise you planned was for one, plus the autopsy showed clear signs of poison.

Name: JAKE
Text: And for the record, the inside of his body was very gross.

Name: CHARLES
Text: Noted. My only question is, why'd you do it?

Name: MRS PATTERSON
Text: Um, he drove me to it. He had affair after affair. He was a real don Juan.

Name: JAKE
Text: Permission to make a fat joke?

Name: CHARLES
Text: Granted.

Name: JAKE
Text: Are you sure you didn't mean "don flan"? Thanks.

Name: CHARLES
Text: Nice. Mrs. Patterson, you are under arrest for the murder of your husband.

Name: ROSA
Text: Sarge, that painting is tight.

Name: TERRY
Text: It's terrible. The brushwork is sloppy. There's poor use of negative space. I'm a fraud.

Name: HOLT
Text: Not at all. I'd like to take this home for my husband. He'll be glad you made me look so happy.

Name: TERRY
Text: I was trying to make him look serious. I still can't read him.

Name: ROSA
Text: No one can.

Name: AMY
Text: I can. He likes it.

Name: DIAZ
Text: Nice job, Boyle. You nailed it.

Name: JAKE
Text: Here. Of course he did. He's a great primary. And I'm sorry I was such a bad number two. I may, for the first time, have been a bit of a jerk, and I'm sorry.

Name: CHARLES
Text: What a wonderful moment.

Name: JAKE
Text: I agree, it is a wonderful moment. What a wonderful moment. Rosa, do you agree?

Name: ROSA
Text: It's all right. It's all right

Name: CHARLES
Text: Oh. D.A. wants to set bail for Patterson's wife. They need me to send them all the files.

Name: JAKE
Text: I'm the secondary. I'll go back there and do the busy work. You guys stay here and keep celebrating.

Name: ROSA
Text: You sure you're not just sneaking off for more weird dead guy s*x?

Text: We will never speak of that again. Never. Okay, bye.

Text: God. Crazy day, huh?
